channel.title: Contracts on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Contracts on FinanClub

item.title: BA
item.description: score:-11 Chances: Boeing wins a contract to enhance Japan’s F-15 Fighter Jets, showcasing potential growth opportunities. Boeing will meet its 737 delivery goal despite new production problems, providing confidence in meeting targets. Boeing clinches a $173 million contract to aid F/A-18 E/F Aircraft, indicating continued business contracts.

item.title: FTI
item.description: score:160 Chances: TechnipFMC has clinched a significant contract for the Girassol Life Extension Project, indicating growth potential in the oil and gas sector. The company announced the initiation of a quarterly dividend and an additional $400 million share repurchase authorization, which may attract income and value investors.
